post_title: T206 Trying some more of these, check it out.
post_content:
I have another post like this and thought I'd try it again, I guess you could call it a step down sale. I'm going to post a few cards for sale each with a starting price today 7/4. I will also post lower prices that I would accept at 2 day intervals. Buyers can state that they would buy the card at any of the posted prices at any time, if we get to that date and the card hasn't sold on a previous day at a higher price then the first person stating they would buy the card at the current day price gets it. Days start and end at midnight for these purposes. For instance, I post a card stating the following:

Day 1 $250
Day 2 $225
Day 3 $200
Day 4 $180

Example 1: On Day 2 someone says I'll take the card at $225 they they win the card.

Or

Example 2: On Day 1 some says I'll take it at $200 on day 3. If the card hasn't sold by Day 3 at Day 1 or Day 2 price that person saying on Day 1 they would take it at $200 gets the card.

Pretty simple, it lets you lock in a price on the card at a level you're comfortable with and let's me hopefully sell the card at a price that I am happy with. Note all prices include shipping, please state your price level in the body of the post and whether it's no fee venmo or pp gs.  If you are an NC resident please add 6.5% ST.

Here we go.

7/4 $320 venmo no fee or $322.50 pp gs
